articles.author: Reuters
articles.title: Australia's James Hardie to acquire U.S.-based AZEK in $8.8 billion deal - CNBC
articles.description: James Hardie Industries said on Monday it will acquire outdoor products manufacturer AZEK in a cash and stock transaction valued at $8.75 billion.
articles.content: Fibre-cement maker James Hardie Industries (JHX.AX), opens new tab said it would acquire U.S outdoor building products maker AZEK Company (AZEK.N), opens new tab in a cash and stock deal worth $8.75 … [+2077 chars]
